titles.title: Homefront Heroes Tax Relief Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit for care packages provided for soldiers in combat zones.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
4/15/2008--Introduced.
Homefront Heroes Tax Relief Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for up to $500 of amounts paid to provide care packages to members of the Armed Forces serving in a combat zone.
